tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  AMAZING LECTURES  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: The guy himself is pretty funny, and the labs themselves are spent mostly identifying minerals then taking hard quizzes/tests on them + the formulas. The new field trip to San Carlos to collect material from the mantle was pretty tops. Other than that, don\'t trust what he says about his final exam; he says it\'ll be one thing then made it different.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Funny, down to earth professor.Sort of helpful.The only grades for the class are 3 exams,a project & lab grade.Previous exams posted (look & do them!),easy to find answers,recycles most questions but could be formatted different or be trickier.Lab is fun but memorizing mineral formulas can be tough, over 100 of them , most will be on lab final.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He is a very respectable professor. Glad that he didn\'t have any tests in this class though, because the material was hard! Helped out a lot in lab, helps get you more interested in the subject.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Bob is a very intelligent, respectable professor. Though this class was interesting, most of the information isn\'t useful unless you plan to be a mineralogist. The necessity of sheer memorization for parts of the exams is disappointing. Be sure to learn how to do the problems a few days before the exam, because there aren\'t examples in the notes.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Downs is a fantastic teacher. He loves minerology and you will walk away wanting to be a minerologist. Exams are not too tough and lab is fun. You learn some really cool stuff!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: First test is a breeze...then watch out! It gets tougher...And the final? Hope you\'re good at memmorizing random chemical formulas you will just look up in future.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: He\'s interesting and loves his subject. Tests are a breeze, old exams are online and he uses the exact questions. Lab is fun and really gets you interested in mineralogy
